rai@chalhoub.com>; Bonsu Prempeh <Bonsu.Prempeh@chalhoub.com>; Christelle Abela <Christelle.Abela@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Maison Margiela - Mall of Emirates
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have an Opening of New Store “Maison Margiela Boutique at Mall of Emirates”. Under OTB entity.

BU Code - CO024

RMS Code – 79307

 

the handover from project team is on Tuesday 18th Feb, and the opening date is on Friday 21st Feb 2025.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

https://rso.e-mac.com/Pages/managechecklist.aspx?IntGUID=07c8a74d-f7a5-9b17-b5ac-1106abb1f2e8

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971504769298
